sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Nav, Navbar, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux" import {logout} from "../actions/userActions" const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const logoutHandler = ()=>{ dispatch(logout()) } return (
Shop
Cart {userInfo ? Profile Logout : Sign In }
) } export default Header
